trans-unit.source: Returns data from a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached" /> or a <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os dados de um evento <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached" />.

trans-unit.source: `RecognizerUpdateReached` events provide a mechanism for pausing a speech recognition engine to apply atomic and synchronous modifications, such as loading and unloading grammars.
trans-unit.target: `RecognizerUpdateReached` os eventos fornecem um mecanismo para pausar um mecanismo para aplicar modificações síncronas e atômicas, como carregar e descarregar gramáticas.

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo estiver usando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> para gerenciar o reconhecimento de instância, ele pode usar uma da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos para solicitar que o mecanismo de pausa para receber uma atualização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instância gera um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos quando ele estiver pronto para a atualização.

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instância está pausada, você pode carregar, descarregar, habilitar e desabilitar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos e modificar os valores para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance to manage recognition, it can use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to request that the engine pauses to receive an update.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo estiver usando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> para gerenciar o reconhecimento de instância, ele pode usar uma da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos para solicitar que o mecanismo de pausa para receber uma atualização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> event when it is ready for the update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instância gera um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos quando ele estiver pronto para a atualização.

trans-unit.source: While a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instância está pausada, você pode carregar, descarregar, habilitar e desabilitar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos.

trans-unit.source: When handling <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, a recognition engine pauses until the event handler returns.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, um mecanismo de reconhecimento de pausa até que retorna o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> deriva de <xref:System.EventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um aplicativo de console que carrega e descarrega <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> método para solicitar o reconhecimento de fala seja pausada para que ela possa receber uma atualização.

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo, em seguida, carrega ou descarrega um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto.

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> event writes the name and status of the currently loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects to the console.
trans-unit.target: Em cada atualização, um manipulador para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento grava o nome e o status de atualmente carregado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos no console.

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: Como as gramáticas são carregadas e descarregadas, o aplicativo primeiro reconhece os nomes de animais de farm, em seguida, os nomes de animais de farm e os nomes de frutas, em seguida, somente os nomes de frutas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio position associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do áudio associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location within the speech buffer of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> when it pauses and raises a <c>RecognizerUpdateReached</c> event.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o local dentro do buffer de fala de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> quando ele faz uma pausa e gera um <c>RecognizerUpdateReached</c> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the location indicated by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> to access audio input that occurred while the recognition engine was paused.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos podem usar o local indicado por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> para acessar a entrada de áudio que ocorreu enquanto o mecanismo de reconhecimento estava em pausa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>UserToken</c> passed to the system when an application calls <see cref="Overload:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <c>UserToken</c> passado para o sistema quando um aplicativo chama <see cref="Overload:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate" /> ou <see cref="Overload:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the <c>UserToken</c>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto que contém o <c>UserToken</c>.

trans-unit.source: An application specifies a `UserToken` when it requests the generation of a `RecognizerUpdateReached` event by calling one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods that take a `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo especifica um `UserToken` quando ele solicita a geração de um `RecognizerUpdateReached` evento chamando um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos que usam um `userToken` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a console application that loads and unloads <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um aplicativo de console que carrega e descarrega <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The application uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method to request the speech recognition engine to pause so it can receive an update.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> método para solicitar o reconhecimento de fala seja pausada para que ela possa receber uma atualização.

trans-unit.source: The method passes in a <xref:System.String> object for the `userToken` parameter that describes what the application will recognize after the update.
trans-unit.target: O método passa um <xref:System.String> de objeto para o `userToken` parâmetro que descreve o que o aplicativo reconhecerá após a atualização.

trans-unit.source: The application then loads or unloads a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo, em seguida, carrega ou descarrega um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto.

trans-unit.source: At each update, a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> event writes the contents of `userToken` to the console.
trans-unit.target: Em cada atualização, um manipulador para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento grava o conteúdo de `userToken` para o console.

trans-unit.source: As grammars are loaded and unloaded, the application first recognizes the names of farm animals, then the names of farm animals and the names of fruits, then only the names of fruits.
trans-unit.target: Como as gramáticas são carregadas e descarregadas, o aplicativo primeiro reconhece os nomes de animais de farm, em seguida, os nomes de animais de farm e os nomes de frutas, em seguida, somente os nomes de frutas.
